definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Many of these can be derived from the schematics or the memory configuration of your target hardware.

sentences.english: These hospitals are required to install the hardware and software to process smart-card transactions.
sentences.chinese: 要求这些医院安装处理智能卡交易的硬件和软件。

sentences.english: Have knowledge of computer hardware, software, network setting and maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉计算机硬件，软件，开发包网络设计和维护。

sentences.english: Finally, hardware and software of the electronic load is designed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，进行了电子负载的软硬件设计和初步实验。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制的硬件在环试验平台对上述算法进行了调试。

sentences.english: Designs of hardware and software of the instrument are presented.
sentences.chinese: 并阐述了药壶体积测量仪器的硬件设计和软件设计。

sentences.english: The software and the hardware was really easy.

sentences.english: The hardware system of the design consists of two circuit boards.
sentences.chinese: 硬件电路系统由系统板和扩展板组成。

sentences.english: The realities of the hardware, then, are sculpted to best support that paradigm.
sentences.chinese: 于是硬件的设计就趋向对这种范式进行最好的支持。

sentences.english: The motherboard manufacturer then customizes this BIOS to suit its own hardware.
sentences.chinese: 主板制造商则此BIOS定制适合自己的硬件。

sentences.english: At the end of the paper, we expatiate the kernel part of the hardware.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对硬件实现的核心部分作了详尽的阐述。

sentences.english: The system hardware circuity and software programming concept are presented in detail.
